titleStmt.title: The fellow-traveller through city and countrey
titleStmt.author: Edmundson, Henry, 1607?-1659.

titleStmt.title: The fellow-traveller through city and countrey
titleStmt.author: Edmundson, Henry, 1607?-1659.

notesStmt.note: Special t.p.: The fellow-traveller in entercourse among students and scholars, p. [87].
Attributed to Henry Edmundson by Wing.
Imperfect: pages 193-214 (signatures K1-K11) lacking; best copy available for photographing; pages 238, 262 and 286 misnumbered as 138, 162 and 186 respectively; pages stained.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
